data.title: Dev Mode Repository
data.meta_description: An Xbox Dev Mode Store for all your favorite apps and emulators.
data.text:
Xbox Media Tool

A simple and essential tool to set up your USB for Xbox!

Safe Exit

Allows you to safely return to retail mode with ease!

LaunchPass

A customizable frontend for Dolphin, PPSSPP, Retrix Gold, RetroArch, XBSX2 and Xenia Canary. It`s recommended to use an Image instead of a Video for the Game Detail Page Background.

Moonlight

Allows you to stream your PC games to Xbox!

RetroPass

A simple frontend for Dolphin, PPSSPP, Retrix Gold, RetroArch, XBSX2 and Xenia Canary running on Xbox. The UI is similar to that of the Game Pass section of Xbox for a familiar feel.

Retrix GOLD

Retrix Gold is a frontend for Libretro Cores, it supports less than RetroArch currently but is much simpler to use.

XBSX2.0 (Xbox Series ONLY)

Standalone PlayStation 2 Emulator. A substantial update to XBSX2, from the ground up! This is the best version to use on Xbox Series consoles!

*Xbox Series consoles ONLY!*

AM2R

An unofficial remake of the 1991 Game Boy game Metroid II: Return of Samus in the style of Metroid: Zero Mission

NO DIRECT LINK (for legal reasons).

Cave Story

A complete open-source clone/rewrite of the masterpiece jump-and-run platformer Doukutsu Monogatari (also known as Cave Story).

Game files included!

Classic Celeste

A PICO-8 platformer about climbing a mountain, made in four days.

Game files included!

DevilutionX

A source port of Diablo and Hellfire that strives to make it simple to run the game while providing engine improvements, bugfixes, and some optional quality of life features.

REQUIRES GAME FILES

Heart of Darkness

A fiendish force scours the land in search of Andy, a young boy on a quest to rescue his dog Whisky.

REQUIRES GAME FILES

JazzÂ² Resurrection

Escape the dungeon, retrieve the precious jewel, and punish Devan for his evil deeds.

REQUIRES GAME FILES

OpenLara (Tomb Raider)

Explore Peru, Greece, Egypt and the lost continent of Atlantis in search of an ancient artifact.

REQUIRES GAME FILES

Relic Hunters Zero

A remaster of the FREE 1 million player hit game about blasting evil space ducks and turtles with tiny cute guns.

Game files included!

Sonic the Hedgehog

Play as a blue little lad and destroy the monstrous rancid EggMan.

REQUIRES GAME FILES

Sonic the Hedgehog 2

Play as a blue little lad and destroy the monstrous rancid EggMan. This time with a friend!

REQUIRES GAME FILES

Sonic 1 Sms Remake

This game is a redesigned version of the Master System released by SEGA in 1991

Game files included!

Sonic 2 Sms Remake

This game is a redesigned version of the Master System released by SEGA in 1992

Game files included!

Zelda3

A young boy named Link has to save Princess Zelda and six other maidens from Ganon using the Master Sword to save them.

REQUIRES GAME FILES
